
enemy massive


00f88e



example

01 - screen position

40 - x position

00 - ?

70 - y position

06 - enemy type


Types enemies

06 - Cowboy with a knife (move)

08 - Cowboy with a grenade (no move)

04 - Cowboy with rifle (move)

ba - boulder (can move)

02 - Cowboy with gun (no move)

b4 - Cowboy on horse 

5c - Cowboy sniper

16 - mini tornado

12 - scrolling the screen to the boss 

20 - teeter boards

18 - the boss in the cart

9E - ?

6E - soldier patrol (move)

6c - soldier with a rifle and grenades (no move)

60 - plane with a machine gun

72 - soldier standing and running (move)

70 - soldier throw grenades (no move)

7a - armored car

c0 - bike or tank

8a - plane dropping bombs

b6 - boss tank part 1

b8 - boss tank part 2

c2 - boss Berta

7c - soldier with a rifle (no move)

7e - soldier with a machine gun (no move)

80 - soldier throw grenades low (no move)

84 - butting soldier helmet (move)

6a - boss man with boxes

64 - grenadier

88 - shepherd

be - tank (You can grab the)

c4 - the boss on the big tank

66 - scientist arsonist

cc - boss electro ball 

92 - turret

8e - turret

bc -

obstacles & items massive


01038c

01C0006022

example

01 - screen position

c0 - x position

00 - ?

60 - y position

22 - obstacle type


Types obstacles


00 - Enter the door

22 - box with gold

54 - box with a stop time

48 - box with a hat

38 - box with a rifle

0a - snake

28 - box with stones

40 - box with grenades

96 - turret slow

1c - Falling cannonball heaven

b2 - door, Indy detonates dynamite

30 - box with knives

50 - candle gives light

0c - rat

0e - bat

a0 - 

a2 -

a4 -

a6 -

34 - box with gun

10 - bat alternate

b0 -

aa -

ac -

ae -

74 -

4c - box with a gas mask

78 - gas

90 - turret fast

98 - turret slow

3c - box with a machine gun

44 - box with dynamite

2c - box with a whip

58 - box of invulnerability

52 - lantern giving light

d2 -
